ModMetaData.name: Animal Feed Trough (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of BaconBits mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=25580.msg259998#msg259998
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/AnimalFeedTrough
--- Original Description --- Tired of watching your animals eat off the floor like filthy...um ???...animals? Not any more. Get the 'Animal Feed Trough' and those pigs will be eating in style. *A wooden trough specifically for Hay and Kibble
